scripts.test: newman run e2e/Kachasi_API.postman_collection.json -e e2e/Kachasi_Env.postman_environment.json --folder "Logger Level" -r htmlextra,cli,junit --reporter-htmlextra-export ./results/report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "Kachasi API regression Report" --reporter-htmlextra-displayProgressBar --reporter-junit-export results/junit-report.xml
